The /projects/collaboration/update API accepts requests in the following format:

UpdateCollaboratorRequest Model - Request to update an existing collaborator.
projectId integer
required
example: 23456789
Project Id we want to add the collaborator to.
collaboratorUserId string
required
example: mia-ai
User Id of the collaborator we want to add.
liveControl boolean
example: True
Gives the right to deploy and stop live algorithms.
write boolean
example: True
Gives the right to edit the code.
Example 
{
  "projectId": 23456789,
  "collaboratorUserId": "mia-ai",
  "liveControl": True,
  "write": True
}
